name: Orientation Education
description: Some states require an inclusive or discriminatory view towards sexual orientation. A couple states require only negative information to be provided on homosexuality and/or positive emphasis on heterosexuality which invalidates many people's valid orientations.

source.name: Guttmacher Institute
source.title: State Laws and Policies: Sex and HIV Education
